channel.title: 530 - Netty 4 networking, scratch project!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2dmb7o4.png[/img]
[size=18pt][b]No longer working on this! :([/b][/size]
Hey guys, I'm starting my own scratch framework using Netty 4 (credits to HcoJustin, for helping out). The skeleton of the base has been created just need to work on login and game world.
Quick overview on the game layout for far; [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/1r4vth.png[/img]
Current [b]TOOD [/b]list (will add more, along side progress)
- Add Update Server - Login - Basic packethandling (walking, button clicking, chat etc)
^ Very brief introduction on the project if you would like to apply please post below using the following format:
[code] Name: Age:
Coding Experience: Though's on development:
Why you would like to apply:
[/code]
Thanks :)
